prod_desc.heading: Why Buy boAt Airdopes 131 Pro TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation Technology
features: 11mm Drivers for stronger bass, and crisper sound.
ENx Technology subdues background noise to send a crystal-clear voice.
Beast mode reduces lag up to 65ms to make every experience smooth.
ASAP Charging up to 5mins for 60 mins of playtime.
sub_features: To enjoy a wire-free music experience, buy boAt Airdopes 131 Pro TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation Technology. For all-day comfort, these truly wireless earbuds are crafted from high-quality material, these lightweight truly wireless earbuds offer supreme comfort. The type of Bluetooth support is crucial in your truly wireless earbuds as it impacts the stability of the connection. As these truly wireless earbuds feature Bluetooth v5.3, they offer a reliable calling experience, allowing you to stay in touch with your loved ones. Powered with 11mm drivers, the bass is stronger, the treble is higher, and the sound is crisper. Enjoy New standards in entertainment. Every pin drop translates immediately. Never miss a single footstep due to audio lag. With 65ms ping, whether it's gaming or media consumption, experience seamless audio with BEAST Mode.

With the boAt Airdopes 131 Pro TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation Technology’s price, you certainly won’t be burning a hole in your pocket. For enjoying your favorite movie or listening to songs without having to frequently juice up, your truly wireless earbuds need long battery life. With 45 hours of battery life, you can go without charging and if you do run out of juice, boAt’s ASAP Fast Charge gives you 60 minutes of playtime with only 5 mins of charging. Water is the one thing that destroys electronics. Thankfully, IPX5 Water resistance means that there is no need to be concerned. Since everything is enclosed in an airtight shell, your earbuds will last longer because water won't get inside. Sound as if you are there over the calls with the ENx™️ Technology that subdues background noise and sends your voice across clear as a crystal. This new Bluetooth earphone is all you need to tune out of the world’s chaos and be heard loud and clear every time. So, Hurry Up! Get the boAt Airdopes 131 Pro TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation Technology online without any delay!

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
